card.name: Freedom Credit Card
card.description: Best Card for your Everyday Spends & Big Purchases with rewards on select merchants and fuel surcharge waiver.
card.target_audience: Salaried and Self Employed individuals with minimum age 21 years.

categories.name: 10X CashPoints on select merchants
categories.description: Earn 10 CashPoints per ₹150 spent on BigBasket, BookMyShow, OYO, Swiggy & Uber (non-EMI spends).
categories.terms_and_conditions: Applicable on non-EMI spends on the 5 merchants. Maximum 2,500 CashPoints per calendar month. Excludes fuel, EMI, wallet loads/prepaid card loads & voucher purchases. Terminal/Merchant IDs must be recognized. Returns/refunds adjust points.
categories.how_to_earn: Spend on select merchants via app or website.
categories.validity: CashPoints valid for 2 years from transaction date.
categories.exclusions: Fuel spends, rent payments, government transactions, wallet/gift/prepaid card loads, voucher purchases, cash advances, payment of fees, Smart EMI/Dial an EMI.

categories.name: 1 CashPoint per ₹150 on other spends
categories.description: Earn 1 CashPoint per ₹150 spent on other spends excluding EMI, fuel, wallet loads/prepaid card loads & voucher purchases.
categories.terms_and_conditions: Excludes fuel, rent payments, government transactions, wallet/gift/prepaid card loads, voucher purchases, cash advances, payment of fees, EMI transactions.
categories.validity: CashPoints valid for 2 years from transaction date.
categories.exclusions: Fuel spends, rent payments, government transactions, wallet/gift/prepaid card loads, voucher purchases, cash advances, payment of fees, EMI.

bonus_rates.condition: Swiggy Dineout payments using coupon code HDFCCARDS
bonus_rates.terms_and_conditions: Get 10% additional discount on Swiggy Dineout payments.

redemption.process: Redeem via Net Banking login, Phone Banking, or physical redemption form.
redemption.terms_and_conditions: Minimum 3,334 CashPoints (₹500 equivalent) required. Redemption fee of ₹50 applicable from 1st August 2024. CashPoints expire after 2 years.
redemption.processing_time: CashPoints posted in 1st week of subsequent calendar month.

redemption.process: Redeem via SmartBuy Rewards Portal for flights, hotels, and products.
redemption.terms_and_conditions: Can redeem up to 50% of booking value through CashPoints. Redemption capped at 50,000 points per calendar month for flights and hotels. Up to 70% redemption on select vouchers/products from 1st February 2023.
redemption.processing_time: CashPoints posted in 1st week of subsequent calendar month.

benefits.name: Fuel Surcharge Waiver
benefits.description: 1% fuel surcharge waiver on fuel transactions.
benefits.how_to_avail: Use card for fuel transactions with minimum ₹400 and maximum ₹5,000 per transaction.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Minimum transaction ₹400, maximum ₹5,000 per transaction, maximum waiver ₹250 per statement cycle. Rate may vary depending on fuel station and acquiring bank.

benefits.name: Exclusive Dining Privileges
benefits.description: Up to 20% savings on restaurant bills via Swiggy Dineout.
benefits.how_to_avail: Pay via Swiggy App using the offer.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Offer inclusive of restaurant and Swiggy discount. Valid only on payments via Swiggy App.

benefits.name: Interest Free Credit Period
benefits.description: Up to 50 days interest free period from date of purchase.
benefits.how_to_avail: Pay full outstanding by due date.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Subject to submission of charge by merchant.

benefits.name: Revolving Credit
benefits.description: Enjoy revolving credit at nominal interest rate.
benefits.how_to_avail: Pay minimum amount due to avail.
benefits.value: Nominal interest rate as per fees and charges.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Refer to Fees and Charges section for details.

benefits.name: Zero Lost Card Liability
benefits.description: Zero liability on fraudulent transactions if loss reported immediately.
benefits.how_to_avail: Report lost card immediately to 24-hour call centre.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Report loss immediately to toll free numbers 1800 1600/1800 2600 or +91 22 61606160 for overseas customers.

benefits.name: Smart EMI
benefits.description: Option to convert big spends into EMI after purchase.
benefits.how_to_avail: Use Smart EMI option post purchase.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Refer to Smart EMI terms for details.

benefits.name: Contactless Payment
benefits.description: Enabled for contactless payments up to ₹5,000 without PIN.
benefits.how_to_avail: Look for contactless symbol on card and use at enabled terminals.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Payments ≥ ₹5,000 require PIN entry for security.
benefits.usage_limit: Maximum ₹5,000 per contactless transaction without PIN.

current_offers.title: Renewal Fee Waiver
current_offers.description: Renewal membership fee waived off by spending ₹50,000 and above in an annual year.
current_offers.terms_and_conditions: Applicable only on payment of membership fee.

perks.name: Welcome Benefit
perks.description: 500 CashPoints on payment of joining membership fee.
perks.how_to_use: Receive on payment of joining fee.
perks.terms_and_conditions: Applicable only on payment of membership fee.

partnerships.how_to_avail: Spend on these merchants using the card.
partnerships.terms_and_conditions: Non-EMI spends only, capped at 2,500 CashPoints per calendar month.

partnerships.how_to_avail: Use coupon code HDFCCARDS on Swiggy Dineout app.
partnerships.terms_and_conditions: Offer valid only on payments done via Swiggy App.

fees_and_charges.terms_and_conditions: Fee applicable on joining; welcome benefit given on payment.

fees_and_charges.waiver_conditions: Waived if spend ₹50,000 or more annually.
fees_and_charges.terms_and_conditions: Renewal fee applicable annually; waiver on eligible spends.

fees_and_charges.waiver_conditions: Minimum transaction ₹400, maximum ₹5,000; maximum waiver ₹250 per statement cycle.
fees_and_charges.terms_and_conditions: Fuel surcharge waiver applies as per terms.

fees_and_charges.amount: Varies as per outstanding amount slab
fees_and_charges.waiver_conditions: No late payment charges if Minimum Amount Due paid by due date.

fees_and_charges.terms_and_conditions: Processing fee applicable on Easy-EMI transactions.
